{{cid|Wolverine Vol 2 -1}}{{g|Chronologically}} | History = The Department of Agriculture was a branch of the [[United States Government (Earth-616)|United States Government]] located within the [[Jamie L. Whitten Federal Building]] in [[Washington, D.C.]]{{r|Wolverine Vol 2 49|50}}{{r|Wolverine Vol 2 -1}} In the '70s, [[Adamantium]] expert [[Myron MacLain (Earth-616)|Dr. Myron MacLain]] worked for the Agriculture Department; he was approached by [[Department H (Earth-616)|Department H]] agent [[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Logan]], in search for answers about his Adamantium skeleton.{{r|Wolverine Vol 2 -1}} After the [[Weapon X (Earth-616)|Weapon X Program]] was shutted down by [[Weapon Plus (Earth-616)|Weapon Plus]], the Department of Agriculture acted as a cover for Weapon X's leader [[Truett Hudson (Earth-616)|The Professor]]'s illegal activities.{{r|Wolverine Vol 2 49|50}} | Equipment = | Transportation = | Weapons = | Notes = | Trivia = | Links = }} [[Category:Historical Organizations]]
